description: This hike takes you along a ridge overlooking Okanagan Lake, then down through a lush forested area to the edge of Ellison Provincial Park.
directions: South from Vernon on Hwy #97 to Bailey Rd. Turn right and head north about 2 km to Commonage Rd. Turn left on Commanage Rd and drive to Predator Ridge Dr. Turn right here and proceed to street parking near N50° 11.243' W119° 23.680'.
title: Predator Ridge to Ellison Provincial Park
